summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York to T-Mobile, commanding the company to appear and produce subscriber records for phone number 561-502-8809 from 2000-2005 for the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330) for which the subpoena is issued.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signed the subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Court appearance for T-Mobile subpoena
events.description: T-Mobile is commanded to appear before the U.S. District Court to testify and produce subscriber records for phone number 561-502-8809.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena is part of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
It demands T-Mobile produce subscriber records for phone number 561-502-8809 from 2000-2005.
The subpoena was issued on July 28, 2021, with a court appearance scheduled for November 29, 2021.
Failure to comply would constitute contempt of court and subject T-Mobile to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
